s.text: Should I make a pest of myself and keep telling my friends that I live in Wales, not England, or should I just shrug it off?
Not only as a child, but even now--well into my adulthood--this rule has served me well.
Prudie recommends that you patch it up if you wish the whole thing had never happened.
And since Prudie is living in America in 1999, a small addendum about those brides who've previously been up at bat.
There is a chance that, by their lights, they assumed that had you been home you would have "lent" them the wine.
There is a chance that, by their lights, they assumed that had you been home you would have "lent" them the wine.
